project_plan.name: CSV Data Analysis Tool in Python
project_plan.description: This project involves creating a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read CSV file.
Implement functionality to identify numerical columns in the CSV file.
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate the median for specified numerical columns.
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns.
Write tests for each of the implemented functionalities above.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
